credit_line: Gift of Edward L. Kallop Jr.
dimensions: Overall: 260 x 76.8 cm (8 ft. 6 3/8 in. x 30 1/4 in.)
title: La Trappistine
description: Statuesque figure of a young woman completely draped, holding flowers in her right arm, her left hand resting on a bottle of "Trappistine" Liqueur whichis on a drapped table at her side. Her head is surrounded by a halo in elaborate pseudo-Romanesque style.
name: Poster
